mapper.select: SELECT ta.user_id AS friend_id , tu.nickname AS nickname , tu.real_name AS real_name , tu.avatar_url , IFNULL(tc.unread_num, 0) AS unread_num , tc.content , tc.type , tc.create_time FROM admin AS ta LEFT JOIN `user` tu ON ta.user_id = tu.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(sign = 0 OR NULL) AS unread_num , friend_id , uni_table.content , uni_table.create_time , type , nickname , avatar_url FROM ( SELECT tm.id , to_id AS friend_id , content , 1 AS sign , create_time , type FROM message AS tm WHERE tm.from_id = #{userId} AND tm.to_id != #{userId} UNION SELECT tm.id , from_id AS friend_id , content , sign , create_time , type FROM message AS tm WHERE tm.from_id != #{userId} AND tm.to_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC ) AS uni_table INNER JOIN `user` AS tu ON uni_table.friend_id = tu.id GROUP BY uni_table.friend_id ) AS tc ON tc.friend_id = ta.user_id WHERE ta.user_id != #{userId} ORDER BY tc.create_time DESC
SELECT tm.id, tm.from_id, tm.to_id, tm.type, tm.content, tm.create_time, tm.sign from message AS tm WHERE tm.to_id = #{userId} AND tm.sign = 0
